app.name: AI ChatGPT Agents by eesel
app.short_description: The ultimate AI agent that can instantly draft replies and handle Tier 1 tickets.
app.long_description:
### The ultimate AI agent for your Customer Service and Support 

Within a few minutes, get an AI agent that will transform your support. Reduce costs, improve quality of replies, and free human agents up to focus on what matters. Key features include:

- **5 minute Set Up:** Simply install the app, and within 5 minutes, get an AI agent ready to go

- **Draft replies for all tickets:** For all incoming tickets, the AI can automatically draft replies and leave it as an internal note for your human agents

- **Answer Tier 1 tickets:** If you like, you can get the AI to automatically handle and respond to Tier 1 tickets

- **Escalate to humans:** The AI can automatically escalate tickets to a human as needed

- **Easily train on any past tickets, help articles and more:** Whether it's your Zendesk help center, or your Confluence wiki, or some Google Docs, you can train your AI agent with this in a few minutes.

- **Customisable tone:** You can fully customise the tone with which the AI responds

### Why Choose this over other AI bots? 

- **Seamless Zendesk Integration:** Set up workflows so your AI agent only interacts with specific tickets, keep conversation data within Zendesk, set up smart escalations, get advanced reports on your bot and more.

- **Train on any Knowledge**: No other solution has as many app integrations as eesel AI. You can train your bot on your help centre, Confluence wiki, Google Docs, Notion and more - all in a few minutes.

- **Trusted by Global Brands:** Join industry leaders like Drift, Indebted and 100s of others use our AI agent.

- **Commitment to Security:** We're proud to be GDPR compliant, and can even support zero data retention for any Zendesk tickets or user information.

### Get Started for Free

Try it out and see for yourself. It only takes a few minutes to [get started](https://eesel.ai). For more information, simply email us at hi@eesel.app.
app.installation_instructions:
# How to integrate eesel AI into Zendesk

## Step 1. Set up an [eesel AI account](https://dashboard.eesel.ai/api/auth/signup?returnTo=v2)

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138570084/a649c7c739573b847510d079/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=eeb8fa9a7f603ed193bbc3dfaeceb865a59e78c1ff3aad56d59248b47802a5c5)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138570084/a649c7c739573b847510d079/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=eeb8fa9a7f603ed193bbc3dfaeceb865a59e78c1ff3aad56d59248b47802a5c5)

## Step 2. Train your eesel AI bot on relevant "Sources"

eesel AI works with "Sources" and "Destinations". You can train it on different "Sources" like your Zendesk Help Center, and plug it into different "Destinations" like your Zendesk as an AI agent, or as a chat bubble.

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138571069/6eda460156085277609f8eb6/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=ba2c0fb35d6c5cabb952dbc03607d7062ee209ac32f3e4d65624568307a16d40)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138571069/6eda460156085277609f8eb6/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=ba2c0fb35d6c5cabb952dbc03607d7062ee209ac32f3e4d65624568307a16d40)

To start, let's train on your Zendesk Help Center.

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138572868/16e6ca1e5b545fccf38087ca/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=469e66736353402234d7f944d431b8f278139987946f5a124cb2ee253fb4a2fd)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138572868/16e6ca1e5b545fccf38087ca/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=469e66736353402234d7f944d431b8f278139987946f5a124cb2ee253fb4a2fd)

## Step 3. Chat with the bot in the Dashboard

Here you can start tinkering with the bot and it will give you answers based on the "Sources" you have added. You can add PDFs, CSV files, Google Docs and so on as Sources.

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138575342/81287fa9cf0f61905f0d0974/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=7cec799342e4d305e11a08671e06ba4dcb8cd9c90b2781af3864168e1ec51006)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138575342/81287fa9cf0f61905f0d0974/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=7cec799342e4d305e11a08671e06ba4dcb8cd9c90b2781af3864168e1ec51006)

## Step 4. Add a "Destination"

Destinations are what you plug your bot into. For instance, you can make a Chat Bubble.

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138576546/47987cb6686b04876714e94c/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=bdf90ded48301b84f006e4ff8868f9b179f1cfb47fd432f722b60b8839624cc8)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138576546/47987cb6686b04876714e94c/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=bdf90ded48301b84f006e4ff8868f9b179f1cfb47fd432f722b60b8839624cc8)

You can also insert this into Slack.

[![](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138577069/eeaa1c6874536b3345df70ec/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=a4f20e95b566638ec3e80de7266153bf28b3e411f73f79d4f72147e1aaaa7c56)](https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/1138577069/eeaa1c6874536b3345df70ec/image.png?expires=1723104000&signature=a4f20e95b566638ec3e80de7266153bf28b3e411f73f79d4f72147e1aaaa7c56)

Questions? Reach out with our chat in the bottom right!
